definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: Next I smudged the yellow to start forming the random sections of color where the gradient will go.
sentences.chinese: 接下来我对色彩发生随机渐变的部分进行模糊处理。

sentences.english: The tapered coaxial slow-wave-structure is the most important part of a MILO.
sentences.chinese: 渐变型同轴慢波结构是磁绝缘线振荡器的核心部分。

sentences.english: The first command builds the shaded U.S. states map.
sentences.chinese: 第一条命令将构建色彩渐变的美国各州地图。

sentences.english: But instead, requires enough gradual overlap.
Used to create effects of gradated tone; ideal for retouching photographs.
sentences.chinese: 用来创造渐变色调的效果，是修描相片的理想工具。

sentences.english: Subtly using gradients is a great way to provide depth and makes things come to life on the screen.
sentences.chinese: 利用渐变是创造深度和真实性的好方法。

sentences.english: Python: Can a 3d plot made from a list of data points have a gradient color scheme?
sentences.chinese: 可以由一列数据点的三维图有一个渐变的色彩方案？

sentences.english: Create another selection and fill with a new gradient.
sentences.chinese: 在新建一个选区，使用一个新的渐变色填充。

sentences.english: One of my favorites is the good old gray to black (or darker gray) radial gradient.
sentences.chinese: 我的最爱之一就是从老灰到黑灰的渐变。

sentences.english: A magnificent gradation of grey crystals sparkles at the centre of the flower.
sentences.chinese: 渐变的灰色水晶石绽放在花朵的中央。

sentences.english: With gradients, it’s often best to just keep things simple.
sentences.chinese: 渐变设计通常是用来保持事物朴素的最好方法。

sentences.english: The 4-Color Gradient effect produces a four-color gradient.
sentences.chinese: 四色渐变滤镜生成一个四种颜色的渐变效果。

sentences.english: The 4-Color Gradient effect produces a four-color gradient.
sentences.chinese: 四色渐变滤镜生成一个四种颜色的渐变效果。

sentences.english: There is a narrow transitional zone from high hardness to low hardness on the interface.
sentences.chinese: 在界面存在一个从高硬度到低硬度的渐变过渡区。

sentences.english: The sky, deepening to ochre, is broken by two or three seagulls.
sentences.chinese: 两点三点白鸥划破了渐变为赭色的天空。

sentences.english: I couldn't put this kind of fabrics into gradient color.
sentences.chinese: 这种渐变色我没没法在这个面料上操作。

definition: to smudge (become smeared)/to smudge (create a blurred effect)/shading (wash painting technique)
